descricao: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.
elenco: Ellen Pompeo,Sandra Oh, Patrick Dempsey, Katherine Heigl, Sara Ramírez, Justin Chambers and Jesse Willians.

descricao: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.
elenco: Cillian Murphy, Tom Hardy, Helen McCrory, Joe Cole, Annabelle Wallis, Anya Taylot-Joy, Fin Cole, Sam Claffin and Charlotte Riley.

descricao: In the dark, early days of a zombie apocalypse, complete strangers band together to find the strength they need to survive and get back to loved ones.
elenco: Jaime King,Justin Chu Cary, Zoe Marlett, Erika Hau, Salvador Velez and Christine Lee.

descricao: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, brilliant college dropout Mike Ross finds himself working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.
elenco: Patrick Adams, Gabriel Macht, Meghan Markle, Sarah Rafferty, Gina Torres and Rick Hoffman.

descricao: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
elenco: Henry Cavill,Anya Chalotra, Joey Batey, MyAanna Buring, Anna Shaffer and Freya Allan.

descricao: A famous psychic outs himself as a fake, and starts working as a consultant for the California Bureau of Investigation so he can find Red John, the madman who killed his wife and daughter.
elenco: Amanda Righetti,Owain Yeoman ,Tim Kang,Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.

descricao: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar, as well as the many other drug kingpins who plagued the country through the years.
elenco: Wagner Moura, Pedro Pascal, Alberto Ammann, Boyd Holbrook, Paulina Gaitán and Boyd Holbrook.

descricao: Eight thieves take hostages and lock themselves in the Royal Mint of Spain as a criminal mastermind manipulates the police to carry out his plan
elenco: Úrsula Corberó, Álvaro Morte, Itziar Ituño, Miguel Herrán, Jaime Lorente, Pedro Alonso and Alba Flores
